website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional deal if you need attractive cabinet knobs and are watching your budget; you get quality, quantity, and value.
pros: Classic design that complements most cabinet styles: satin nickel finish, round shape, and 1 1/4-inch diameter
cons: The screws may be on the short side when installing them in thicker cabinet doors

customer_reviews.title: beautiful with white cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! I just painted my cabinets white and these knobs look great. They're heavy and seem like a quality product. I was able to use the screws that were included. Easy to install and buying here saved me a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for right pricing!
customer_reviews.text: It has been almost a year since I bought and installed those knobs. There are beautiful and well made. No scratches, peeling or discoloration from usage. I was afraid of buying dark knobs for dark cabinets, but those look amazing. Got so many complements.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Not 1 1/4” as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT 1 1/4” knobs. I wanted to replace the knobs I currently have because some are starting to peel. I was excited to get 25 flat black knobs at this great price! Unfortunately they are only 1” in diameter and are way too small for my liking. As you can see in the picture comparing them against my current (peeling) knob to this one. They are tiny! They are going back immediately. What a let down! On the upside, they do seem well made if you are in need of a tiny knob.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and very durable
customer_reviews.text: These hardware knobs are made very nice. They are smooth no rough edges, heavy duty and shiny. I bought the set of 25 they come individually packaged with one screw. I will definitely buy more for The rest of my cabinets, converting from gold to silver knobs.
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Knobs for less than half the price at big box stores!
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality cabinet knobs for less than half the price at the big box home improvement stores. I knocked off one star because we had to purchased longer screws in order to install them. Otherwise you can't go wrong with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly and her Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Screws supplied are too short
customer_reviews.text: So. Most cabinet drawers today are boxes with fronts, backs, and sides which the drawer front is fastened to. If it’s a quality cabinet the drawer is probably 5/8 thick with 3/4 inch drawer fronts. Add those together and you get 1 3/8 inch min. The screws sullied are 1 inch. Now I have to go back out and buy all new screws.
customer_reviews.author: jkasperows

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It looks good; but I was disappointed that it comes with only 1" screws. How could any one install this on a cabinet with 1" screw is beyond me. It is partially my mistake since I should have paid more attention to this size. So anyone out there, be careful when you order it. Otherwise, like me, you have to run down to the hardware store to get either 1.25 or 2.25" screws for it to fit. I have 22 pieces and I had to buy separate screws and washers to make it fit. What came with it was useless. So just be aware of this.
customer_reviews.author: Soudamini M. Nath

customer_reviews.title: styles from this company and they are always 100% solid (no annoying dish behind the rounded front to catch your fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: These are top-notch "standard" cabinet knobs. Nothing special design-wise, but never anything wrong with them, I have installed maybe 100 of them now of different types, styles from this company and they are always 100% solid (no annoying dish behind the rounded front to catch your fingers and make them feel cheap), they could easily pass for $4/ea knobs. Screws that come with only work with 5/8-3/4" doors (which is normal and not their fault), just an fyi, so you can't go through false front drawers without your own hardware.
customer_reviews.author: bobbob

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS UPGRADE/REFRESH FOR KITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: These are great! First of all they are heavier than I expected and very sturdy. Looks like a very well made product and I'm shocked at how cheap they were compared to other places I looked. I bought these for my parents' new condo. They had to replace some old glass knobs and these fit perfectly in the pre-drilled holes and matches their appliances and other existing pulls perfectly. They are super easy to install. I like how they come with a longer screw and a shorter screw. I used the short ones in the kitchen on the cabinets and I used the longer ones for their bifold closet doors. Very happy with these and their simple but modern design.
customer_reviews.author: piccionm

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping for cabinet knobs and didn't want to pay $3-6 per knob. It just seemed ridiculous the me. So glad I found these! The quality is comparable to the more expensive knobs and I paid less than $1 each. Wonderful deal! I bought the black. They came individually wrapped in a small box, packaged well. The only negative, and this wasnt a problem for me, they only come with one size screw. A lot of knobs come with two sizes. 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Elmisti72

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than similar size knobs by Liberty
customer_reviews.text: These knobs look great on golden oak cabinets. They have a solid metal feel and finish that does not show fingerprints. We had samples of Liberty knobs and ordered these by Allison because they were a better value. The base of the shank of these knobs by Allison is slightly smaller (we prefer the look and feel of the beefier base of the Liberty). After six months of daily use in our kitchen these knobs still look new.
customer_reviews.author: WojoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They are so heavy. I didn't need to use the screws because I was able to re-use the screws from the old hardware, so I can't comment about that - but they look so great and made such a huge difference. The cost was also $30 less than similar ones from Overstock.com. I didn't have any issues with any of them (no defects as far as i could tell). They look great in my stainless steel kitchen! (See before and after photos!)
customer_reviews.author: KathyP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cabinet knob
customer_reviews.text: I recently got my kitchen and half bath cabinets painted and used these cabinet knobs to complete the design. They are weighted nicely, all one piece (for those concerned with loosening or spinning as you use), classic and simple style, and the perfect silver finish to complement most home styles and designs. It does only come with one size screw which were too short for my cabinets but I ended up using the screws from my old knobs and it worked great. I’m sure we will find use for the other screws! Overall great purchase and we’re happy with the quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: Colene Horton

customer_reviews.title: Real happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: These are what they appear to be. Pretty heavy, solid metal. Also, we wanted 12 of these, so we ordered the 10 pack, and 2 singles. If you're in the same boat, you'll probably notice the product description changes slightly between the singles and the 10 pack, and it's slightly mysterious if they are, or are not, exactly the same knobs. They *are* exactly the same. The singles are sold in retail bag, the 10 pack is in a wholesale/direct-ship box, that's the difference.
customer_reviews.author: DrKK

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are for different products.
customer_reviews.text: Amerock BP53005G10 Allison Value Mushroom Cabinet Knob, 1.25" (32 millimeters) Diameter, Satin Nickel, 25 Pack came with 2 different length screws. The 10 Pack came with just the shorter screw which is what I need anyway for my standard 3/4 inch thick cabinet doors. I read a review that said the knob was shiny. This is not. That review must have been for a different color. Seems to be good quality. I decided I better get a jig to install these since I have over 30 to install.
customer_reviews.author: D. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed with your purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We remodeled our kitchen and bought these for our cabinet doors. Dont be fooled by the price. They are solid and very well made. You won’t be disappointed with your purchase. It’s a fraction of the cost in comparison to major retailers!
customer_reviews.author: RoRo308

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything that I had expected this product to be. It appears to be well made and has a very rich look. However, my tape measure says that this knob is 1-1/4 inches across not the 1-1/4 inches that the description claims. It was probably measured by the same knob that convinced his wife that 3-1/2" was actually 8".
customer_reviews.author: Gary Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the most part
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 10 pack. They matched the ones that I already had exactly. Eight of them are really good quality. They feel stout and have a bit of weight to them. The other 2 are much lighter, not as good of quality but not bad. However they look the same. You have to look very close to be able to see the difference. The one on the right (in the pictures) is the heavy one. It's not a big deal to me. I'll just put those 2 on cupboards near each other but away from the others.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple, plain bronze cabinet/drawer knobs. Other reviewers mentioned them being too small, but I think they're the perfect size. They also seem very sturdy. Each knob came in its own individual bag and includes two different size screws. The smaller size was used for the cabinets and the larger size was used for drawers. The price is very good when compared to home improvement stores. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cabinet pulls of good weight at an amazing price. Very Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cabinet pulls of good weight. Excellent price. Exactly as described (including screw length) and delivered on time! The new knobs are high quality. and given their quality, they are suitable for a variety of settings. I replaced the cabinet and drawer pulls in my utility room because I never liked the designer's choice (which was surprising given her excellent taste). The cream colored cabinets look even now. Taking into consideration the price and convenience, buying from Amazon was far better choice than chasing around town to buy from a hardware store and spending more money for a potentially inferior knob. Highly recommended,
customer_reviews.author: OldWhatsHisName

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonably priced and perfect stainless match
customer_reviews.text: Promptly shipped and perfect match for my kitchen re-do. Brushed nickel faucet and stainless appliances all match. These were easy to install in my newly painted white cabinets, The knobs stick out a bit, so they are easy to grab when opening the doors or drawers, without scratching the cabinet paint. The supplied screws were also the perfect depth. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Fat Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Really heavy duty, good quality knobs.
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed these for .99 cents each and though it was budget friendly, I wasn't expecting much, but I was surprised! These are heavy, very good quality knobs. They are smaller for small drawers, but ended up being perfect for my dresser project. I have three small drawers in the middle of my dresser so I grabbed three of these knobs. Will look for this brand for future projects.
customer_reviews.author: Micha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two packages of these (each with 25 knobs). These cabinet knobs are terrific. They are carefully packaged so that they won't scratch each other in the box. They are solid, substantial, even elegant (we got the brushed nickel). They are reasonably priced, especially for the quality. Although others have mentioned issues with the screw (these come with 1 inch), I found that these were long enough for most of the knobs, and where these screws didn't, the older, slightly longer hardware fit these new knobs. Our cabinets look great, if not like new.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Five Star ⭐️ Item 🙂👍
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen knobs are solid, shiny, and beautiful. One knob has poor tread, so they need to replace the ONE knob. After speaking to Amazon Customer Service, they were unable to return and replace one knob, as issued a small refund. I now must go to a local store to find a replacement knob for the one that is broken- not happy ! Otherwise, these knobs are five ⭐️⭐️ ⭐️⭐️ ⭐️ ! I’d buy them again in a heartbeat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great knobs...one piece of advice....
customer_reviews.text: These knobs are outstanding. We have espresso colored cabinets and I installed these on the doors and handles on the drawers, and the kitchen looks great. Piece of advice when installing them.....make sure when you tighten the screws that the "brushed" part of the nickel is installed the same direction on all the knobs. They catch the light very well, and the brushed ridges disperses the light in such a manner that they will look a little off if not installed running the same direction. Your best bet is to run the brush marks up and down vertically. Running them horizontally makes them look a little oblong or "out of round."
customer_reviews.author: Momtweens

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value, great product.
customer_reviews.text: These have some heft to them, and are a great value. They do have a "grain" to them so depending on how you screw then on they may cast a horizontal or vertical appearance to them. I'm a little ocd about that type of thing so I just made sure to screw them in all the same. I replaced old knobs with these and love the look. They are a great value. Each one is individually wrapped with a screw that's included. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much for the bathroom that I repurchased for our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the quality for these knobs. They are heavy, solid, and definitely do not feel cheap. I bought the chrome finish for our bathrooms and they dont show fingerprints! I loved them so much that I bought the satin nickel finish for our kitchen. They are super easy to install and come with two screws (one long and one short). I only needed the short screws.
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking round knobs, albeit simple in design. We ordered enough to replace the outdated polished brass knobs throughout the house. Individually packaged and each came with a screw. There were NO seams on any of the knobs and they were all perfectly finished (no defects). Note that the screws are only long enough for a typical cabinet door. They are not long enough for a drawer where solid wood face plate has been screwed onto the drawer case (resulting in two layers the screw needs to go through). In our situation, we just reused the old screws so the length didn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend. Knob feels solid and built very well. Also looks simple yet elegant. Couldn't find a knob like this anywhere near me so Im happy I came across this on here. Wife and I both love it. It was also very easy to install and did not come across any issues. Comes with both a short and long screw.
customer_reviews.author: anthony orellana

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I used these knobs to replace the ones in my bathrooms. The bathroom is entirely chrome (faucets, racks, etc.) but the door knobs were brushed nickel, which drove me nuts! The Allen and Roth ones at the local box store were $2.96 each! I compared both and these are just as nice at 1/3 the price. My only problem was the screws weren't long enough on four of the cabinet doors. I didn't go buy a longer screw, just took the path of least resistance and countersank (countersunk?) the screws into the back of the door. I am hoping to find them listed in different quantities as I am two short for my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on my white cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kitchen to help make it look a little more modern. We bought a house with white cabinets (which I hate but can't replace right now) and white knobs. We replaced the drawer knobs with pulls, and the cabinet knobs with these matching nickel knobs. It looks so much better! Slowly replacing the white appliances with stainless and its all coming together!
customer_reviews.author: StephanieCTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Made an inexpensive set of dressers from Ikea look like a million bucks!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment for work while my family lives in another city about a 90-minute drive out. To be practical and save expense, I purchased several dressers from Ikea. They were unfinished so I painted them and purchased the knobs for the drawers. They look fabulous! For around a dollar each, they are substantial with a nice shine to the chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Dechaine

customer_reviews.title: DISSAPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: THE GOOD: -none THE BAD: -diameter is much smaller -received less items than mentioned. -Most of the screws were missing -some of them were defected. THE BOTTOM LIE: Not a good experience. Not even as advertised. Diameter of knobs were too smaller and didn’t look good with any quality cabinet. I would definitely not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: hamza

customer_reviews.title: Quality handles at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these versus the big box stores. Pricing on these at time of purchase was $6.97 for 10CT or roughly $0.70 each, whereas home depot has an identical handle they are charging $3.25 each. Pick em up, they look great. Out of the 20 purchased, i had maybe 1 or 2 that had a slight deviation in threads, but still worked just fine. Nicely packed, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and shiney
customer_reviews.text: I really like these knobs and the price was very reasonable. I liked that they provide 2 different length screws which made them fit either my cupboard doors or the thicker drawer fronts perfectly. No more having to wipe down the wood because of needing to open a door or a drawer with wet or messy fingers while in the middle of making a meal. They are a perfect length to get a hold of without touching the wood. I’m glad I got enough to put in the bathroom cabinets also.
customer_reviews.author: kgroom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't receive a pack of 25
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to receive a pack of 25, but only received 1. Order these before and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Qood quality stuff available to an amazingly value for money price
customer_reviews.text: The knob does what it is supposed to do: look good and do its job. It comes with two or three different sized screws. The smaller one worked for me, but your dresser might need the bigger screw. I was able to sell my night-stand at an optimum price after fitting it with this knob. I wasn't able to sell it because of the missing knob, so getting this knob for sub $2 and getting $20 extra in return for my nightstand was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Anshita Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for improved cabinetry look
customer_reviews.text: cannot belive the quality for the price I paid! Love these knobs. Compared to prices at my big box stores, and these were so much cheaper. Love the look. I have two-toned cabinets with a gray on the bottom and off-white on the top. Both look great with these knobs. I did have to buy the extender screws that you can break to every quarter of an inch for my drawers, but I believe that would have been the case no matter which knobs I purchased. After 5 months of installation, knobs still look new. Highly recommend to anyone to update their cabinetry.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsay

customer_reviews.title: Too many issues.
customer_reviews.text: I had so many problems getting these and had to cancel the order twice. Then I was recharged for the item and only 1 showed up when it was supposed to be a pack of 10. Needless to say I returned it and recieved a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the satin nickel cabinet knobs. They are great quality and arrived very fast. They feel sturdy and are easy to get a hold of. There is plenty of space for your fingers to get a good grip without sticking out far. If you looking for simple, but quality cabinet knobs, these would be a great option.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are by far a better deal than anything I found in the stores. We have had them for several months now and they have held up just fine. They really dress up the cabinets and give them a polished look. They are easy to install. I made a template to ensure my holes were all predrilled in the same location since we had no knobs previously.
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: Good, quality knobs
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat buyer of these knobs. They are very good quality especially for the price! What I really appreciate is that they come with two size screws: 1" and 1 1/2". I plan to keep buying more as often as I need them. They also have a good weight, which adds to the quality feel of the knob. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: Solid product that matched perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the stock hardware on our new vanities. They match out faucets perfectly. Install was a breeze. If you can’t easily install these then I’m going to be a bit concerned. The 25 pack was great because we installed two separate vanities. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: COM3IT Solutions, LLC.

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Knobs
customer_reviews.text: These knobs are great. They look good and I'm very pleased with how they look on my cabinets. I only wish there was a choice of the screw length. The ones supplies are too short for my drawers so I had to go to home depot for the proper length. That being said they look great and are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Sparta

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy unless they correct this problem.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 14 knobs, same exact part number on each of packages, 12 of the packages contained screws that are 1 inch in length, two of the packages contained two screws, 1 inch and one 3/4 inch in length. 12 of the knobs are unusable unless I go and buy the 1 3/4 inch screws. All of the packages have the same exact part number??
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good, generic knobs.
customer_reviews.text: These knobs make quite a difference in my kitchen. I previously had “brass” knobs that I thought made the kitchen look dated. These knobs are a great value for the money. At any big box store, they were almost twice the price. They are a good size and while they are not as heavy/sturdy as my old ones, they still do a great job for providing a minor update.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Perone

customer_reviews.title: Simple, unadorned, and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: If that is what you are looking for, you will not find many/any better offers. I needed 17 knobs, and with other possible choices, I would have spent much more money. They are bathroom knobs for a family bath - not a high-end kitchen - so these were perfect for our need. With that, we spent the unused $25-$30 dollars on an upgraded faucet since life is a series of gives and gets. Now, what to do with the other 33 knobs? :)
customer_reviews.author: An Amateur Renaissance ManTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: I put these on a piece I did for a friend... it went perfectly and they’re a great value for the price. Thinking about switching out all the knobs in my kitchen for these, they’re beautiful in person. I did give 1 star for stretch because they’re metal, a regular knob.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Quality satin nickel knobs for your kitchen cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knobs based on good reviews and it was very satisfied. I bought the 10 packs, each was individually wrapped with 2 screws inside. The knob was heavy, well made and sturdy. I love how it feel when I hold it, so smooth and cool to touch. I will definitely buy it again if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: ACP STLUKES

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet knobs are with good quality. The price is unbeatable. We got them for about 60 cents each when they were on sales. The only comment is that the knobs only come with short screws. I had to buy a long screw from Lowes for one of the cabinet drawers that has a thicker board.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Love this knob!
customer_reviews.text: Love these knobs! They were the perfect finishing touch to a dresser that I stained and brought new life to. Love the size, weight and color (black). No option on my iPhone app to add pictures. Too bad. :( Will add on to review later if any issues over time.
customer_reviews.author: MinookaMom

customer_reviews.title: The Value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price, I bought this item based an other peoples review. The only down fall was I had to buy screws due to the ones provided were too small. It stated they were 1.25 inch but they were too small. I bought screw at home depot which were 1.25 inches and they fit perfect. I called Amazon and they were able to resend another order and provided a return label for the prior shipment but even though after receiving a second shipment the screws were still a problem. Regardless I was happy for the quality of the knob even though I had to spent a few extra bucks and screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the application
customer_reviews.text: Got 25 of these nifty little knobs for the price of one from the Kitchen Design store - there's were shipped from England, these came from China but are identical - so much so that I suspect the ones from England probably also originated in China. Sturdy, well finished & good looking...
customer_reviews.author: assegai

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works well
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well for me & was priced significantly lower than comparable items. It came with two screws of different lengths, so you should have what you need for most installations. I thought the extra long screw was helpful & a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a couple sets of these knobs when we moved into our new house and had SEVERAL to change out. These are great for the price, heavy, well made, and come with two different length screws for thicker drawers/cabinets. They look awesome. Will definitely order more if we decided to change out the knobs in the upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan & Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Great "Feel"
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and good for most cabinet door and drawer installations. However, the enclosed screws are not long enough drawer fronts where there's a separate drawer box and drawer front. In that event, you'll need to buy longer screws at the local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: John Parziale

customer_reviews.title: BUY ME!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to change the hardware on our kitchen cabinets, I needed 24. Went to Home Depot and Lowe’s and their multipacks were (at cheapest) $20 for 10. Thought it might be worth a try to buy these and I’m SO glad I did! They are heavy, appear to be good quality, and are very affordable compared to others at ~$1/knob. The included screw was too short to use to install so I had to use the screws drombthe old hardware, no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Woods

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced all of our door knobs in our RV with these. They were extremely easy to replace and came with different length screws to accommodate doors and drawers. They really look nice and we are very happy with the upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: PLIFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Ii was concerned about this hardware not being very nice quality because it was so inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Ii was concerned about this hardware not being very nice quality because it was so inexpensive. I wanted something very solid and expensive-looking. But we're a young couple who just bought our first house and money is tight, so I bit the bullet and ordered this. They are quite lovely - they're slightly more delicate than an almost-identical model at Lowes, but still very heavy and respectable. I'm glad we bought them! They add a lot of class to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and quality, look much more expensive than what we paid!
customer_reviews.text: We actually chose these knobs over other knobs that were priced three to four times higher than these. These knobs are beautiful and have a nice heavy weight to them. They are simple yet make a nice statement on our new off white cabinets. They also match beautifully with our new antique brass lighting fixtures. Couldn’t be happier! Oh and the price is a steal! Buy these now!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These knobs are amazing! They are heavy and good quality, not lightweight and cheap-feeling. They matched my new stainless steel appliances perfectly and it only took me 45 minutes to replace my old black knobs. Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: SU Alum

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced all my custom knobs with these because we put our house on the market to sell. I didn't like any of the "value" knobs at the DYI stores, but these worked well and I'd use them for any decor. Very pleased with the quality and length of screws to install them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality and Enhances Appearance and Usefulness
customer_reviews.text: We just added these to our kitchen cabinets and the matching pulls on the kitchen drawers. They are very nice quality and really added to the decor - also they make opening/closing cabinets/drawers so much easier. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Goodenuff

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Hassle-free, and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: We're very pleased with these pulls. I replaced the ones that originally came with my bedroom furniture, which were squared and kind of sharp, so we had grown tired of dinging our legs on them. The new Amerock pulls are great - they give good clearance for bigger fingers to get a grip, and have a perfect brushed metal look to them. The installation was quick and easy, and I had all 22 pulls swapped in less than 15 minutes. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: DC James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for IKEA RAST dresser
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement to make my IKEA RAST dressers prettier than the wooden knobs that came with the dressers I’ve ordered multiple times Now (have 10 dressers that needed 6 knobs each) and it’s a much better value than buying at the big box stores
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Klein

customer_reviews.title: Missing long screws.
customer_reviews.text: It comes with long & small screws but Missing most of long screws.
customer_reviews.author: Abu

customer_reviews.title: Great knob
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both of my bathrooms. Switched out the ones that were on when we bought our house. I installed them without any problems. They are sturdy and good looking. Highly recommend these chrome knobs.
customer_reviews.author: frenchtoast

customer_reviews.title: Nice look at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I was replacing old brass knobs in my kitchen. Thanks to one of the other reviewers I didn't have to worry about the screw length. I simply used the screws that were already there... the ones that had been used for the knobs I was replacing. It was perfect! My kitchen looks updated and the knobs cost a lot less than from the big box hardware store. I'll be donating my old hardware to the local Habitat for Humanity Restore so all in all I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: RichE

customer_reviews.title: Actually really impressed
customer_reviews.text: For how inexpensive these are, they look amazing. We got a high-end bathroom vanity, and the knobs look like they were designed for the vanity. They feel sturdy, have a very nice polish, and have no visible seams. I would absolutely get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam T. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality - 4 stars only because of the short fasteners
customer_reviews.text: BP53005G10 are a direct match for 10BX53005G10, even though the color doesn't appear to be the same. I ordered both. These work great on cabinet doors, but on thick boxed drawer fronts, the fasteners are way too short to work.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I updated my "country" kitchen with these. Now changing out Mom's cabinet knobs before her house goes on the market. These are perfect to give an understated polished look to cupboards. Very good value. Beware seller OJCommerce!
customer_reviews.author: dansjen

customer_reviews.title: Will be good if you get an unchipped batch.
customer_reviews.text: The knobs themselves look very nice and feel heavy and well made, but I never even got to the poi t of trying to install them on my cabinets. The first bag I took out of the box and opened had a huge chip of paint out of the side. So I looked through and found six out of 25 had chips or scratches in the knobs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought some cute bear paw knobs for our cabin up north but they were junk. Got these as a replacement...should've bought these from the get-go. They look great and are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: nisey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: The knobs look great with my white cabinets. The screws that came with the knobs did not fit so I just used the screws that came with my old knobs. They were very easy to install. I bought a pack of 25, but the package only included 23 knobs. Now I have to purchase another small set.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gariboldi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I just used my old screws so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I just used my old screws so I didn't even need the ones that came with them, but they would have been long enough for the cabinets, but my drawers have an extra piece on the back side so they would not have been long enough there. These are such a great size, shape and feel. SO HAPPY and such a great price. I did my whole kitchen for under $50 and it matches our appliances and made a big difference. Thanks for a great product and price!!
customer_reviews.author: WI girl loving life

customer_reviews.title: Fixed an ugly desk
customer_reviews.text: As you can see, I painted this ugly desk, and added the brass and knobs. The knobs are heavy and sturdy and look great. I just wish I could have used stain, but as you can see it now looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price. Thoughtful to include two screw sizes
customer_reviews.text: Because of the price, I thought these would be lightweight knobs. They are pretty sturdy, and it was very thoughtful to include two screw sizes which makes a difference when ordering knobs and the screw is too short or too long.
customer_reviews.author: LaTrenda Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cabinet knobs
customer_reviews.text: The brused nickel knobs are very attractive and a nice upgrade for our cabinet refinishing project. I would suggest using a jig to assure consistent placement for a professional look.
customer_reviews.author: Corny_04963

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my bathroom cabinets. Overall I like the quality. Installation had a catch that these come with only 1" screws and in my case I needed 1.5" so I had to go to Home Depot for that and spend $5 for a 100 screw box which is more than I need. Ignoring that small aspect, I like these knobs. They look good, they are not light, the quality looks good and sturdy. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these knobs. I am building a camper and these are perfect for all my cabinets. They look great, are strong and are super value for money. I would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: izifaddag

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid quality product...easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Take off your old knob and replace it with this new one. New home builder wanted to charged us a few hundred to upgrade the knobs in our new home, I said, "hell NO". Amazon to the rescue and only spent $75 to do the entire house myself. In fact the are much nicer than in the pics. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Blu

customer_reviews.title: New satin nickel cabinet knobs
customer_reviews.text: This package of 25 was perfect for my kitchen renovation project....I replaced my counter tops with granite which meant a new stainless steel sink and a new faucet...when I realized my new faucet was satin nickel and my knobs were all that nasty bright brass finish, I knew I had to replace the knobs. I'm also hoping to replace my appliances with stainless steel....so now the knobs on the drawers and cabinets look so much better. The box of 25 left me with just a few extras!!! THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Came next day. Made for easy update in bathrooms to help increase value of home selling. It was such a simple change and heard good feedback after some house tours. Would recommend this product to family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rainess

customer_reviews.title: Could have had 5 stars..
customer_reviews.text: My only problem..5 of them were defective. Luckily I didn't need all of them
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C.

customer_reviews.title: Antique Silver looks great in the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these doorknobs. The color is antique silver and I put them on an ivory cabinet. They just look amazing and I'm so glad I found them at such a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found these! Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found these! I had to purchase about 35 and these were about a third of the cost of the cheapest I could find at a store, and they look and feel so much nicer! They are heavy enough to not feel cheap, the screws included worked perfect, and there are no blemishes or scratches or any other defects that I can find
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Beber

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for kitchen cabinets & they’re Perfect, shipped to me next day from the date of ordering. They don’t feel cheap at all, nice and heavy. I ordered more for the rest of my cabinets in my home.
customer_reviews.author: TheFrenchieLady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for broken knobs.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced all the knobs on my fiancee's coffee table with these (almost perfect match) after seeing 2 broken knobs forever. Now we have backups for years to come if they ever break again.
customer_reviews.author: Rico68

customer_reviews.title: They're beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these knobs to give my kitchen cabinets a face lift. I wasn't sure about the quality since the price is so low, but wow was I ever surprised. They're beautiful and I'm very satisfied with the quality. I had only two where there were small (VERY small) imperfections, but on upper cabinets you can't even see them. I can't comment on the screws not fitting like others did here because I reused the existing screws from the old knobs, but I can say that every single knob was properly threaded. I'm so glad I decided to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: MaggiePie

customer_reviews.title: high quality and easy install
customer_reviews.text: My builder charged me $5 a pop for this quality exact mushroom style knob .. and I got them for under $1 a knob here on amazon... buy these with confidence, they are awesome

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful finish and hopefully durable.
customer_reviews.text: These replaced some old and worn knobs and dressed up the cabinetry. Time will tell on the durability aspect. But several months into frequent daily use, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Adams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knobs!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Those knobs are beautiful. They compliment my new (Aka enhanced with stain and varnish:) dressers from Ikea so much!! It’s like a new bedroom set! I would be it again! For my new project!
customer_reviews.author: Ldog

customer_reviews.title: Brushed Nickel Knobs
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! These are heavy and match my brushed stainless appliances perfectly. They come with 2 length screws and were easy to install. No issues with the threads. I love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Navimom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect simple dark bronze cabinet knobs
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to replace ugly knobs on my library bottom cabinets. These blend in perfectly with the chestnut finish of the wood. Clean simple design. Easy to install. Solid
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, awesome price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These are so universal and look good in every room of the house. I used them for kitchen cabinets, bifold closet door pulls, bathroom vanity pulls, you name it. They look great everywhere and I'm super happy with Amazon's price for them.
customer_reviews.author: Noellebell

customer_reviews.title: Long screw, but still works
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap and looks cute on our freshly-painted side table! The screw it comes with is ridiculously long, but we just reused the screw from the old knob on this table and that worked out fine!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bomkamp

customer_reviews.title: Not really As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: High quality solid knob but I expected it to look like the picture with the nice "speckle" to the pattern. It is a brass knob, period..nothing special unless the sample I bought was an exception
customer_reviews.author: Pam from Montana

customer_reviews.title: Too reflective. Their idea of satin nickel is not mine.
customer_reviews.text: Too reflective. Their idea of satin nickel is not mine. They are really well made, but they are more like a lightly brushed chrome to me. They are like one step away from polished stainless. Nickel is more grey and not as reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality knobs.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality knobs and they look great. The only issue I ran into was that my drawers required longer screws than the cabinets did. It really wasn't a big deal. A dozen screws only cost about $3.00. If you run into the same situation know that the screws are 8/32 machine screws.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but I had to buy longer screws to use with bifold doors. .
customer_reviews.text: I ordered online to avoid going to the store. Nice, but I had to buy longer screws to attach to my wood bifold doors . So I had to go to the store after all.
customer_reviews.author: CA Family

product_meta.title: Amerock Allison Value 1-1/4 in (32 mm) Diameter Satin Nickel Cabinet Knob - 25 Pack
product_meta.description: Color Name:Satin Nickel| Size Name:Pack of 25The Amerock 25BX40515ORB bar pulls 3 in (76 mm) center-to-center pull is finished in oil-rubbed bronze and comes in a pack of 25. Modern functionality meets straight-forward styling. Simple. Bold. True. The sleek and sophisticated design of the bar pulls collection makes a statement with clean lines and smooth textures. The oil-rubbed bronze finish is a rich, dark brown old world finish with striking light and dark accents. Amerock offers a complete line of decorative and functional cabinet hardware, bath hardware, hook and rail and wall plates. Amerock’s award-winning decorative and functional hardware solutions have built the company’s reputation for chic design accessories that inspire homeowners to express their personal style. Available in a variety of finishes and styles, Amerock offers high quality designs at affordable prices. Always creating. Always timeless. Always Amerock.
feature_bullets: Includes mounting hardware: (Size(s):#8-32 x 1in Truss Head Screw)
Complete with Amerock Guardian Lifetime Guarantee against defect in material and workmanship

specifications.Included Components: 25 count of Amerock BP53005G10 Allison Value Cabinet Hardware Mushroom Knob, 1.25 Inch Diameter, Satin Nickel
specifications.Warranty Description: Please visit http://www.amerock.com/Support/Customer-Support#warranty for full warranty details
